name: obsidian-spotify-embed
description: Obisidian plugin to allow you to embed Spotify playlists or songs in your Obsidian markdown documents.

scripts.dev: cp manifest.json build/manifest.json && cp versions.json build/versions.json && node esbuild.config.mjs
scripts.build: cp manifest.json build/manifest.json && cp versions.json build/versions.json && tsc -noEmit -skipLibCheck && node esbuild.config.mjs production
scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json
